price: 65. où ils demeureront à tout jamais, sans trouver allié ni protecteur.
arabic: خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَآ أَبَدٗاۖ لَّا يَجِدُونَ وَلِيّٗا وَلَا نَصِيرٗا

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: khālidīna fīhā abadan lā yajidūna waliyyan walā naṣīran
